meanings.definition: To make something dirty or impure.
meanings.sent1: He polluted the environment by dumping trash in the park.
meanings.sent2: The factory's waste polluted the nearby river.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoon polluted the garden by digging up all the plants.
meanings.sent4: Gossip can quickly pollute a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The negative comments polluted the online discussion, turning it into a heated argument.
